channel.title: Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Sophos Sophos Firewall
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://www.sophos.com/en-us/security-advisories/sophos-sa-20211210-log4j-rce Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-14 12:43:00 NCSC-NL Updated community link source.

item.title: Sophos Sophos Firewall (all versions)
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Advisory: Log4J zero-day vulnerability AKA Log4Shell (CVE-2021-44228) Sophos https://www.sophos.com/en-us/security-advisories/sophos-sa-20211210-log4j-rce Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Sophos Firewall does not use Log4j. CISAGov Last Update: 12/12/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-15 13:48:56 CISAGov Updated communityNotVulnerable. Updated vendor link Advisory: Log4J zero-day vulnerability AKA Log4Shell (CVE-2021-44228) Sophos.

item.title: Sophos Sophos Mobile
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Advisory: Log4J zero-day vulnerability AKA Log4Shell (CVE-2021-44228) Sophos https://www.sophos.com/en-us/security-advisories/sophos-sa-20211210-log4j-rce Community Resources Resource Link source https://www.sophos.com/en-us/security-advisories/sophos-sa-20211210-log4j-rce Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Sophos Mobile (in Central, SaaS, and on-premises) does not run an exploitable configuration. CISAGov Last Update: 12/12/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-14 12:43:00 NCSC-NL Updated community link source.

item.title: Sophos Sophos Mobile EAS Proxy
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Advisory: Log4J zero-day vulnerability AKA Log4Shell (CVE-2021-44228) Sophos https://www.sophos.com/en-us/security-advisories/sophos-sa-20211210-log4j-rce Community Resources Resource Link source https://www.sophos.com/en-us/security-advisories/sophos-sa-20211210-log4j-rce Community Notes Source Note CISAGov The Sophos Mobile EAS Proxy, running in Traffic Mode, is affected. Customers will need to download and install version 9.
